name: Safetopia
description:
This is the first puzzle from the point-and-click adventure game, Safetopia.

As the Champion of Anarchy, you have been sent to Safetopia, a city which obeys all laws and rules; no matter how silly or severe. In this sequence, you must try to make your way into the city itself, using your wits and point-and-clicking skills.

This is essentially a proof-of-concept, but please do let us know if you'd like to see more!

Design, art, animation, writing: Alice Bittisnich (http://bitter-alice.tumblr.com/)
